branchCategory.name: XLAV, Aluminum High Vacuum Angle Valves, Air Operated w/Solenoid Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>Series XLAV is a high vacuum angle valve for use in industrial applications employing high vacuum and process gases. &nbsp;Common industries that may use these angle valves include semiconductor, solar and other electronics production, as well as food and pharmaceutical manufacturing. &nbsp;XLAV valves are single-acting, normally closed, with a bellows seal over the shaft and spring. &nbsp;The bellows assembly can be replaced, reducing maintenance costs and waste materials.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p>

breadCrumb.name: XLAV, Aluminum High Vacuum Angle Valves, Air Operated w/Solenoid Valve
